description:
As a Job searcher
  I want to browser through EPAM Job offers by various criteria
  So I can find to best fitting offer for me
name: EPAM job searching

elements.name: Searching for a job - Test Automation Engineer

steps.name: the career page is opened
the logo should be visible
the search form should be visible

steps.name: Debrecen, Hungary is selected in the location filter box
Debrecen should be selected in the location filter box
Software Test Engineering is selected in the department filter box
Software Test Engineering should be selected in the department filter box
the search button is clicked on
there should be a job offer for Test Automation Engineer position
the department of the Test Automation Engineer position should be Software Test Engineering
the location of the Test Automation Engineer position should be Debrecen, Hungary
the apply button of the Test Automation Engineer position should be visible
the apply button of the Test Automation Engineer position is clicked on
the description of the job offer should contain "Test Automation Engineer"
the description of the job offer should contain "Debrecen"

steps.name: Minsk, Belarus is selected in the location filter box
Minsk should be selected in the location filter box
Software Architecture is selected in the department filter box
Software Architecture should be selected in the department filter box
the search button is clicked on
there should be a job offer for Test Automation Architect position
the department of the Test Automation Architect position should be Software Architecture
the location of the Test Automation Architect position should be Minsk, Belarus
the apply button of the Test Automation Architect position should be visible
the apply button of the Test Automation Architect position is clicked on
the description of the job offer should contain "Test Automation Architect"
the description of the job offer should contain "Minsk"
